venueName: Sake House Japanese Sushi & Hibachi Restaurant

pages.text:
[Page Title: Sake House Japanese Sushi & Hibachi Restaurant - Japanese Restaurant | Online Order | North Charleston | SC]

Sake House

Welcome to our restaurant!
Come and try our dishes!
Online Order 
Our Story

From Our Grill to Your Backyard
At Sake House in North Charleston, we bring the excitement of hibachi cooking and fresh sushi straight to your table — and now, to your home. Our chefs blend traditional Japanese flavors with unforgettable showmanship, creating a fun, delicious experience for the whole family. Whether you’re dining in our lively restaurant or hosting a private hibachi party at home, every meal is made with the freshest ingredients and a passion for great food.
We believe that good times and great food go hand in hand. That’s why we now offer at-home hibachi service — bringing the fire, the flavor, and the fun right to your backyard or special event. From our famous grilled steaks and seafood to our handcrafted sushi rolls, Sake House makes every gathering memorable.
Join us at Sake House, or let us come to you. We’ll take care of the cooking — you just enjoy the show!

HIBACHI

Our restaurant is decorated in a very Japanese style and can accommodate 120 people for gatherings.
View Menu 
SUSHI

Specializing in sushi,sashimi, and classic rolls, Our restaurant combines traditional techniques with modern flair, emphasizing fresh, high-quality ingredients sourced daily.
View Menu 
Hibachi at Home

We also provide home service, which requires advance appointment.
We Serve With Pride The Hibachi Food on our Menu Hibachi Chef at Home serves freshly prepared meals made with the finest ingredients and topped with delightful presentations. ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤPricingㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤSide Ordersㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤBuffet Style Optionㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ Hibachi Packages:

Additional Information 
There is a $500 minimum for all parties.

The price does not include sales tax or gratuity.

A traveling fee may be charged for distances exceeding 30 miles.

Returning customer or customer was refer by existing customer get a 5% discount

deposit $300 can be paid online
Buffet Style 
Buffet Style – $35/person (Includes chicken, shrimp, steak, mixed vegetables, and egg fried rice).

A minimum of 30 people is required for the buffet style option.

Note that the buffet style does not include the hibachi show.
Table Rental (for Parties) 
Table, chair, utensils per person  $15
